Class MyTokenBasedRememberMeServices

java.lang.Object

      org.acegisecurity.ui.rememberme.MyTokenBasedRememberMeServices
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.acegisecurity.ui.logout.LogoutHandler, org.acegisecurity.ui.rememberme.RememberMeServices, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
public class MyTokenBasedRememberMeServices
extends TokenBasedRememberMeServices

Another way to fix TokenBasedRememberMeServices's NullPointerException. By override logout() method. But configuration files need modified.

Author:
Xuefeng
